import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Navbar from "./Navbar/Navbar"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import Swal from "sweetalert2"; const Checkout = () => { const state = useSelector((state) => state.addItem); var total = 0; const finalItemForCheckout = (item) => { total = total + item.price; return (
  • {item.title}
    {item.price}
    • ); }; const successAlert = () => { Swal.fire({ title: "Yayyy!", text: "Order Placed Successfully.", icon: "success", }); }; return ( <>

    Your cart {state.length}

      {state.map(finalItemForCheckout)}
    • Total (USD) {total}

    Billing address

    Valid first name is required.
    Valid last name is required.
    @
    Your username is required.
    Please enter a valid email address for shipping updates.
    Please enter your shipping address.
    Please select a valid country.
    Please provide a valid state.
    Zip code required.

    Payment

    Full name as displayed on card
    Name on card is required
    Credit card number is required
    Expiration date required
    Security code required
    ); }; export default Checkout;
